description: We have quite the scene for you this week. Not only will you be enjoying two hot young guys going at it, you'll get to feast your eyes on a total of FOUR studs going at it.Dylan McLovin, Marcus Mojo, and Christian Wilde will be tag-teaming Brenden because he drew the shortest straw. Not that Brenden minds getting pounded by 3 hot guys with killer bodies, it's just he might be a bit sore afterward.So sit back and let the games begin!
title: FOUR studs
